experiences.name: Kumbhathon
experiences.short: A 10 day volunteer to bring technology to the Kumbhmela. We visualized changes in population movement on heatmaps, using telecom data.

experiences.name: Graviky Labs
experiences.short: Spent 3 weeks with Anirudh Sharma tinkering around in his lab working on several different things.

experiences.name: Tesseract Imaging
experiences.short: Worked at Tesseract, an MIT Media Lab spinoff where I co-developed an Android application to capture and view 360 degree image+video with the hardware built there.
